questions.question: Hope to hear from you ...........................................
questions.description: Soon means ‘a short time after now’.

questions.question: We arrived a little ...................................
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: Can you finish it as ..................................... as possible?
questions.description: Soon means ‘a short time after now’.

questions.question: She is in her ....................................... seventies.
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: The accident happened ...................................... in the morning.
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: The sky is overcast. It is going to rain ....................................
questions.description: Soon means ‘a short time after now’.

questions.question: Get well ........................................
questions.description: Soon means ‘a short time after now’.

questions.question: We started ........................................... so that we would not get stuck in traffic.
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: They migrated to the US ............................................ this year.
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: ……………………….. this week, I had a strange experience.
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: I don't mind getting up .................................. if there is a reason to.
questions.description: Early means ‘near the beginning of a period of time we are talking about’.

questions.question: He is expected to be here ........................................
questions.description: Soon means ‘a short time after now’.
